description:
**************************************************
 THE #1 COOKING GAME IN THE APP STORE!
**************************************************

"I started playing an hour ago and didn't stop until I had to cook dinner!"  -Adambob.knepper

"Tiny Chef is a solid choice for fans of the genre" -Gamezebo.com

"Definitely a must have app for everyone!" -Leak95

"Awesome game!!! You should get it!" -Hannah564
**************************************************************

Create the five-star restaurant of your dreams in Tiny Chef! 

Design and run your own restaurant in this cute, fun game! Cook food and watch your waiters serve it! Customers bustle around your restaurant, finding their seats, eating their food, and tipping!  Make your restaurant as popular and beautiful as you can.  The better your restaurant is, the more you earn!

FEATURES: 
- Design your very own restaurant exactly as you like it! 
- Unlock tastier and more complex recipes as you level up! 
- Serve new recipes to earn more coins! 
- Earn Recipe Stars for cooking the same dish multiple times! 
- Visit friends' restaurants and leave them tips! 
- Earn coins in real-time, even while away from the game! 
- Collect new recipes daily by learning them from the Academy! 
- Cook your dishes instantly when you're in a pinch with Chef Bucks! 

Please note:  A network connection is required to play. 

************************************************************************** 
Like Tiny Chef on Facebook!
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tiny-Chef/172702336089242

Please review Tiny Chef and give us your feedback!
